smg.text: Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds, becoming force 5 northerly winds with gusts.
Temperature falling significantly. Mainly cloudy. A few light rain patches. Force 5 to 6 northerly winds with gusts.
Temperature falling slightly. Mainly cloudy. Force 4 to 6 northerly winds with gusts.
Dry. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 northerly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Very dry. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 northerly winds.
Very dry. Mainly fine. Force 2 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Very dry. Mainly fine. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
